text: When I test my site and look at the Results Tree, I see several images returning 404 pages that should be working fine. First, regular browsers show the images in question, then JMeter itself shows them if I view the main response as "Render HTML". On the "Request" tab of the images that are listed as giving 404 errors, the path is wrong. It's missing a directory portion out of the middle of the URL. It should be a request for /webapp/offender/images/, but it's showing /webapp/images/. The source of the page response has a does not report this 404 error in JMeter.
creator: breaux@users.sourceforge.net
sebb@apache.org
text:
I'm fairly sure this has been fixed in the current 2.1 branch. Reopen with a 
test case if not.
